title: As lower hotel prices are concerned look here first.
text: For the price, rooms are comfortable and clean and quiet for the most part. The manager and assistants at the front desk are very courteous and attentive and make every effort to be accommodating. Adequate full breakfast. Don't know about the dinners but I overheard someone say it's a lot better now because they rotate the menu. Nice computers if serviced more often. Old world ambiance and hospitality. As lower end hotel prices are concerned, look here first.
